bio:
Send us your n...dudes. 📩Submissions@hotdudesreading.com
Business Inquiries? 📩Business@hotdudesreading.com

list.comment: I'm not exactly ready for swimsuit season, but if these biceps are any indication of what the sandy shores feature for summer, I am here for it. Spare me the SPF, I’ll need to soak up all the rays that I can pronto. Because as they say, if ya can’t tone it, tan it. And if you can’t #BoneIt keep trying because desperation is cool too. #hotdudesreading #HDRfangram

Either someone is playing a practical joke, or this bewitching babe has put a spell on me so I can’t look away. I don’t see a wand — though I bet he has a big one — but that scarf is giving me serious #HarryPotter Gryffindor vibes. Either way, I am ready to hop on his broomstick and ride until this trick turns into a treat. #SlytherinToMyChamberOfSecrets #HappyHalloween #hotdudesreading #HDRfangram

The winter freeze arrived early this week and reminded me I need to buy a new down comforter. But this shorts-clad mountain man looks like he has some extra body heat to spare. Forget the blanket — I just need to get him home so he can warm me up the Australian way. #GoDownUnderMyComforter #hotdudesreading

Is this international man of mystery studying Escobar’s life of crime? Well then, lock him up I say, because smuggling those perfect cheekbones across international borders should be illegal. Even if Danger IS his middle name. Which I guess would make mine #AlottaFagina #HotDudesReading #HDRfangram

Listen - you all know I have practically no standards in life, and I don't even know what "deal-breaker” means. But this motto right here might be the only golden rule I follow…that, and “get em’ while they’re hot!” (No, really, this limited sale is going to be over quicker than my summer diet - only available for orders till August 24! Purchase link in bio.) #LimitedTimeOnly #GoingQuick #LikeMyYouth #hotdudesreading

My post MDW blues were still in full effect until I laid my eyes on this sensual seductionist. He might appear to be distracted by his tunes and tales but my senses tell me that won’t be a problem. With his hearing and sight already occupied, I have no problem leveraging taste and touch. #SavingSmellForMarriage #hotdudesreading #HDRfangram

Somebody Told Me this year’s @panoramanyc lineup is straight fire and I couldn’t agree more. This clean-cut cutie is a close second so maybe I can convince him to join me? After rocking out All Nite we can head home to explore The Pleasure Principle. If he hits all the right notes, he’ll have me screaming #IFeelItComing #hotdudesreading #theweeknd #janetjackson #thekillers #ad

Oh my my my! I was just sitting here daydreaming about actual stuffing for once, and suddenly I’m realizing I have a lot more to be thankful for. Maybe I should invite this handsome devil over for a feast tomorrow - cuz the only thing that’s going leave me more satisfied than Thanksgiving dinner is seeing him lookin’ up from a different angle. #AnyAngle #EveryAngle #hotdudesreading #hdrfangram

“I see London, I see France, I see myself in your pants.” Oh damn did I just say that out loud? In public?? Whatever, wouldn’t be the first time. Hoping this luscious-lipped Londoner heard me because he’ll figure out this trip to Abbey Road station won’t be his last ride down the tube today #HesGotATicketToRide #HotDudesReading

England may not have made it to this year’s #WorldCup finals, but when it comes to sexy suitors, they’re still high on the scoreboard. To win this championship, the rules are a little different and the goal posts are a whole lot wider #HandsAllowed #AndEncouraged #HotDudesReading

There’s something about a Red Sox cap that makes me assume you’ve got a chip on your shoulder and some roughness around the edges. Although this beantown beauty reading a set of cliffs notes may seem like the type to cut corners, I’m willing to let it slide if his rough and tumble spirit translates where it counts. #KissMeImIrish #SlashDesperate #HotDudesReading

Cruising around the Bay Area when I spotted this studious smoke. That tight white shirt and fresh fade could draw more thirsty sightseers than the Golden Gate Bridge. I just hope when we pass Lombard street he’ll notice my curves are just as picture worthy and a lot easier to navigate. With a little luck, he’ll make me his San Francisco treat. #RiceARodeMe #hotdudesreading #hdrfangram

This sexy shark may be off the clock, but he sure is breezing through “The Greatest Salesman in the World.” No need to read any further, sir, because I am buying whatever you’re selling. Why don’t you hop on over here and show me what you’ve learned because I am officially #WideOpenForBusiness #hotdudesreading

Everyone is losing their mind over this #Yanny or #Laurel debate, but all I wanna hear is this sexy professor screaming my name all night long. He looks like he’s smart enough to explain how one recording can sound completely different...and if I’m really lucky, he’ll blow my mind twice in one night #GetOnYaKnees #ItsTimeForLoral #hotdudesreading

Am I the only one howling in this cafe because this spicy stud sure has got me going this AM? Not only is he clutching that paper back tightly, but he is a man of my own heart with hot sauce at an arms distance. Sriracha, Cholula, Tabasco... take your pick, but from the looks of it, I don't think we are gonna need any of it to turn up the heat. #FeelinHotHotHot #hotdudesreading #HDRFanGram

Hot damn, summer is having a strong second wind, and I'm on the prowl for a breeze — something I doubt this summery stud could feel in those skin-tight white jeans. With #LaborDay right around the corner, they have a serious expiration date...which works out great since mine won’t be staying on much longer either. #NoPantsHappyDance #hotdudesreading

Only in New York would you stumble across a subway full of dozens (Dozens!!) of Never Nudes on the way to brunch. I wouldn’t mind kissing any of these men between the cheeks, so to speak, but I have a special interest in this buff bookworm. Looks like he ran out of the house before he could get fully into character. Maybe I should solve both our problems with an invite for brunch and body painting at my place. I’ll get some bangers in the mouth, and he definitely won’t have to leave saying #IBlueMyself #CantWaitForLeadingManParts #AD5 #HotDudesReading #Ad

Don’t get your tinsel in a tangle when it comes to holiday shopping. We’ve got all you need.

HDR MERCH: for when your legal department says it’s “against company policy” to put an actual Hot Dude Reading under the tree. Shirts, Totes, Mugs. Only available until December 3rd! Link in bio.

Almost as magical as this view of the Alps, was how I managed to sit right across from this Swiss dish. I might need to pivot away from my “unofficial mission to find Federer” now that I know he and Toblerone are not the only two delicious things to come out of this country. With any luck, the altitude will go to his head so I can officially start working on #InterlakenItDown #HotDudesReading #HDRFanGram

This #ElectionDay special doesn’t need to do any campaigning to secure my vote because I’m a hard yes for whatever propositions he might have in mind. Hopefully one of them is stuffing the ballot box while I scream something about a #HungChad. At least I think that’s his name ... #HotDudesReading #Vote #SeriouslyThough

Well, dress me up and call me “turkey” because this hefty hunk of a man is getting me in the mood for Thanksgiving. I know it’s still a week away, but I am so okay with starting the prep work a little early. We can turn up the heat and get the juices flowing by playing a little game of “50 Shades of Gravy.” #LetsGetBasted #AndPluckAllNight #hotdudesreading

I usually support the removal of clothing but with merch this cute (purchase link in bio) I’ll let it slide... as long as they let me slide right into this group. #2isbetterthan1 #4isbetterthan2 #ItsSimpleMath #hotdudesreading ***Two weeks only! Like my longest relationship***

We’re freezing our butts off in NYC right now, but things are looking mighty fine on the Westside (and I’m not talking about the weather). I just binged the whole season on #Netflix, and I’m officially scheming to get my own personal meet-and-greet with this sexy songster. I’m eager to show him that he’s not the only one who can belt out the high notes. #ShowLeoMyLeOface #NetflixAndChill #LinkInBio #NOTsponsored #hotdudesreading

Just when I thought this year's most beautiful piece of art had already come and gone (#Ye), I laid eyes on this masterpiece of a man enjoying a nice read. Despite what you may think about manbuns or Kanye, we can all agree that this guy's perfect profile and beautiful book work together as seamlessly as all seven flawless tracks, back to back. Once I work up the motivation to make a move, he’ll be #AllMine and I’m positive he #WouldntLeave. #yeezyseason #hotdudesreading

@Panoramanyc is way too lit for anyone to be sitting around reading a book, but this sexy stunner plotting out his day is too good not to share. I know I plan to start off with #TheXX, sway my way on over to #Odesza and then scream sing to #TheKillers. Though it may be awkward because #NobodysToldMeIHaveaBoyfriend #HotDudesReading #Ad

Had to do a double-take to make sure this pouty playboy wasn’t speed-reading Cliffs Notes in public. And good thing I did - because that’s actually “The Pride”, a sophisticated British love story written for the stage. I can’t wait to volunteer for the role of his passionate and definitely-not-platonic co-star. It won’t get my name in lights on Broadway, but all I care about right now is getting top billing in his little black book. #OnlyTimeIllBeOnTop #HotDudesReading

It's almost as if this pristine prince was just waiting for me outside of one of my favorite restaurants. Did he hear I have one million followers now and am kind of a big deal? Is ‘a milli a milli a milli’ only playing in my head, or did he hear it when I walked by? Regardless, the truth remains that I’m still on the hunt to find my perfect man and so thankful that there are 1MM of you that also fantasize about beautiful bookworms along with me. Here’s to 1 million more followers & 1 million more dick jokes #HeyMom #AreYouProudofMe #HotDudesReading #HDRfangram

There are few things that can make the DMV tolerable and this scruffy sexpot is definitely one of them. If he’s as tired of waiting as I am, I know of a place where he’d be front of the line (because no one else is in it, but whatever). #DepartmentofMyV #hdrfangram #hotdudesreading

I couldn’t be happier that bikini season is finally over. Summer has left me starving & all I can focus on right now is this tasty snack right in front of me. Between his suave lean against his bike, his wavey print shirt and the casual caress of his book pages, I just want to put him between a couple pieces of bread and eat him right up. #YoureGonnaMakeMeCrumb #Hotdudesreading #HDRfangram

Oohh La La... This beautiful Bollywood babe popped right off the movie screen and into my heart. Not only can he sing and dance, but his choice of literature has me lit up like a firework on Diwali. I’ll make my way over to strike up a conversation and hopefully he moves as fast off screen as on. #MumbaiMeARing #hotdudesreading (spotted: @ayushmannk)

While we’re only a few days away from #MothersDay, all I can think about is this dapper Daddy right here in front of me. Do we think I have enough time to solidify dates 1 and 2 AND get an invite home to meet mom? Ya never know unless you try - wish me luck. If it works #LuckWillNotBeALadyTonight #OrTomorrow #OrEver #hotdudesreading

Most days I’m trying to get out of Times Square as fast as possible, but today I saw this studly scholar head down in a property law book and now considering settling in here. I hope he hasn’t gotten to the chapter about squatters rights, because I plan on staying here until he is legally mine. #cantrun #itsthelaw #definitelyhowitworks #hotdudesreading

Something about this bearded beauty has me thinking he knows how to celebrate the lovely ladies in his life, and just in time for #BreastCancerAwarenessMonth no less. October is a month to pause, look around and appreciate the inspiring survivors in our lives, and to remind ourselves to get checked. Or at least revisit those self examination techniques, which I’d happily allow him to help me out with. #SqueezeMePleaseMe #HotDudesReading
After seeing the amazing @sophiabush on @fallontonight last week, I’ve officially Fallon head over heels for Jimmy — though I’d rather be #HeelsOverHead #mcm #hotdudesreading

Ran into this caffeinated cutie on my way to a friend’s #MemorialDay BBQ. I was supposed to pick up some burgers on the way, but all of a sudden, I’m in the mood for a foot-long instead. He looks pretty content but I guarantee my weenie roast will be a lot more eventful than sitting there all afternoon. #INeedAHotDogRealBad #hotdudesreading

Getting ready to ride solo for yet another wedding weekend when this vision in blue almost fell in my lap. With no end in sight to the parade of friends’ bachelorette parties and bridal showers, it’s about time I land some marriage material of my own. In fact, who’s to say I shouldn’t get down on the ground and propose now? He really looks like he has something I’d love #ToHaveAndToHold #HotDudesReading #HDRFangram

I almost lost my breath when I saw this view, and I’m not talking about the Empire State Building. This just goes to show that the sweltering city days aren’t all bad when they present you with a shirtless stud like this. He’s clearly studying up on something, but it’s just so hot I might have to offer to rub him down with some solid SPF…and that #WontBeTheOnlyProtectionHesGonnaNeed #hotdudesreading

What a pleasure to stumble upon this muscled piece of man-candy reading about how to let loose and stop sweating the small stuff. But let's get real, there isn't anything subtle about me stopping, staring and sweating it out over all his big stuff. When it comes to guys like this, I think my own interpretation of what the author meant to say should apply instead #TheNotSoSubtleArtOfGivingAllTheF*cks #HotDudesReading

Spotted this smoking hot stud reading What Doctors Feel, and now I’m severely light-headed. What are the odds he’s medically qualified to give me a full body exam? I may not know what doctors feel, but I can teach him all about what desperately single patients want to feel... #ALotMoreThanHisHands #DidIMentionIHaveAcuteAngina #hotdudesreading
